1#ifndef LUAT_WLAN_H
2#define LUAT_WLAN_H
3
4#include "luat_base.h"
5#ifdef __LUATOS__
6#include "luat_msgbus.h"
7#include "luat_mem.h"
8#endif
9typedef struct luat_wlan_config
10{
11 uint32_t mode;
12}luat_wlan_config_t;
13
14typedef struct luat_wlan_conninfo
15{
16 char ssid[36];
17 char password[64];
18 char bssid[8];
19 uint32_t authmode;
20 uint32_t auto_reconnection;
21 uint32_t auto_reconnection_delay_sec;
22}luat_wlan_conninfo_t;
23
24typedef struct luat_wlan_apinfo
25{
26 char ssid[36];
27 char password[64];
28 uint8_t gateway[4];
29 uint8_t netmask[4];
30 uint8_t channel;
31 uint8_t encrypt;
32 uint8_t hidden;
33 uint8_t max_conn;
34}luat_wlan_apinfo_t;
35
36enum LUAT_WLAN_MODE {
37 LUAT_WLAN_MODE_NULL,
38 LUAT_WLAN_MODE_STA,
39 LUAT_WLAN_MODE_AP,
40 LUAT_WLAN_MODE_APSTA,
41 LUAT_WLAN_MODE_MAX
42};
43
44
45enum LUAT_WLAN_ENCRYPT_MODE {
46 LUAT_WLAN_ENCRYPT_AUTO,
47 LUAT_WLAN_ENCRYPT_NONE,
48 LUAT_WLAN_ENCRYPT_WPA,
49 LUAT_WLAN_ENCRYPT_WPA2
50};
51
52typedef struct luat_wlan_scan_result
53{
54 char ssid[33];
55 char bssid[6];
56 int16_t rssi;
57 uint8_t ch;
58}luat_wlan_scan_result_t;
59
60typedef struct luat_wlan_station_info
61{
62 uint8_t ipv4_addr[4];
63 uint8_t ipv4_netmask[4];
64 uint8_t ipv4_gateway[4];
65 uint8_t dhcp_enable;
66}luat_wlan_station_info_t;
67

73int luat_wlan_disconnect(void);

77int luat_wlan_set_station_ip(luat_wlan_station_info_t *info);

83 LUAT_SC_TYPE_ESPTOUCH,
84 LUAT_SC_TYPE_AIRKISS,
85 LUAT_SC_TYPE_ESPTOUCH_AIRKISS,
86 LUAT_SC_TYPE_ESPTOUCH_V2
87};

117#define Luat_MAX_CHANNEL_NUM 14
119typedef enum luat_wifiscan_set_priority
120{
121 LUAT_WIFISCAN_DATA_PERFERRD=0,
122 LUAT_WIFISCAN_WIFI_PERFERRD
123}luat_wifiscan_set_priority_t;
124
126typedef struct luat_wifiscan_set_info
127{
128 int maxTimeOut; //ms, 最大执行时间 取值范围4000~255000
129 uint8_t round; //wifiscan total round 取值范围1~3
130 uint8_t maxBssidNum; //wifiscan max report num 取值范围4~40
131 uint8_t scanTimeOut; //s, max time of each round executed by RRC 取值范围1~255
132 uint8_t wifiPriority; //CmiWifiScanPriority
133 uint8_t channelCount; //channel count; if count is 1 and all channelId are 0, UE will scan all frequecny channel
134 uint8_t rsvd[3];
135 uint16_t channelRecLen; //ms, max scantime of each channel
136 uint8_t channelId[Luat_MAX_CHANNEL_NUM]; //channel id 1-14: scan a specific channel
137}luat_wifiscan_set_info_t;
138
139
140#define LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM 40
141#define LUAT_MAX_SSID_HEX_LENGTH 32
142
144typedef struct luat_wifisacn_get_info
145{
146 uint8_t bssidNum;
147 uint8_t rsvd;
148 uint8_t ssidHexLen[LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM];
149 uint8_t ssidHex[LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM][LUAT_MAX_SSID_HEX_LENGTH];
150 int8_t rssi[LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM];
151 uint8_t channel[LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM];
152 uint8_t bssid[LUAT_MAX_WIFI_BSSID_NUM][6];
153}luat_wifisacn_get_info_t;
154
